Class PlayerAnimationController

CreatureAnimationController
ca.sfu.cmpt276.fall2025.team14.model.PlayerAnimationController
public class PlayerAnimationController extends CreatureAnimationController
Animation controller for the Player. Applies visual effects such as transparency and colored borders based on the player's current status (invisibility, invulnerability, charm, jetpack).

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    PlayerAnimationController(Player player, boolean useFlippedSpritesAsFallback)
    Creates a new PlayerAnimationController.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    BufferedImage
    getCurrentImage()
    Retrieves the current animation frame for the player, applying additional image processing based on active status effects: Reduced alpha when invisible or invulnerable Green border when holding an alien charm Red border when using a jetpack (velocity boosted)

  • Constructor Details

    • PlayerAnimationController

      public PlayerAnimationController(Player player, boolean useFlippedSpritesAsFallback)
      Creates a new PlayerAnimationController.
      Parameters:
      player - the player entity this controller manages
      useFlippedSpritesAsFallback - whether flipped sprites should be used if others are missing

  • Method Details

    • getCurrentImage

      public BufferedImage getCurrentImage()
      Retrieves the current animation frame for the player, applying additional image processing based on active status effects:
      • Reduced alpha when invisible or invulnerable
      • Green border when holding an alien charm
      • Red border when using a jetpack (velocity boosted)
      Returns:
      the processed sprite image for the current frame
